pages.text: Much like other parasites, Vagrants of Tier 3 or higher can release stored souls in the form of an Orb, which will apply nasty effects to any enemies in range. This can also apply positive effects to other parasites, in some cases.$(br)$(#630000)I can do this with $(k:srpcotesia.orb).
Vagrant Orbs, however, have the unique ability to diffuse any positive potion effects the Vagrant may have to nearby parasites. This appears to work for nearly every effect.
